data.text:
80% of the population of a country speaks Spanish, 10% speaks Arabic, 5% speaks French, and the remaining 5% speaks English.

From among the following, choose the correct option:

The ______ people are a large Berber ethnic confederation. They principally inhabit the Sahara desert, in a vast area stretching from far southwestern Libya to southern Algeria, Niger and Mali.
